title: Creature Feature | The Beach Girls & the Monster (1965) Horror | Colorized Full Movie

sources.title: Creature Feature | The Beach Girls & the Monster (1965) Horror | Colorized Full Movie
sources.description:
Surfer Chicks and Slimey Chills!
A young surfer girl is killed at the beach in Malibu. Professor Otto Lindsay suspects that it is some form of mutated fish. But as the list of victims grows Richard Lindsay, thinks that it is a madman who has a grudge. 

Original title: The Beach Girls and the Monster (1965)

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/ByzV39362iw

Directed by Jon Hall as Richard Lindsay (also Director & Producer)

⭐️ Starring:
Sue Casey - Vicky
Walker Edmiston - Dr. Otto Lindsay
Arnold Lessing - Mark
Elaine DuPont - Jane
Katherine Victor - Margaret Lindsay

00:00:00 Full Movie with subtitles 
00:01:56 Beach Party Intro - "Hey Tom, what are you doin' out there?"  
00:04:20 Monster's First Appearance - Creature grumbling in cave  
00:07:29 Sheriff & Dr. Lindsay Examine Claw Prints  
00:08:54 "Surfers are Little Tramps" - Dr. Lindsay's rant  
00:10:05 Vicki Provokes Richard - "What's the matter, Richard?"  
00:15:32 Hawaiian Surfing Film Screening - Projector starts  
00:17:34 Mark Reveals Bunny's Sculpture - "Rich, this is what I wanted you to see"  
00:27:50 Mark's Breaking Point - "I could kill her!"  
00:38:03 Beach Party Dance - Bright drum music begins  
00:41:01 Richard's Guitar Serenade - "More Than Wanting You"  
00:45:39 Tom's Murder - Monster attack witnessed by Mark  
00:50:54 Vicki's Last Phone Call - "Malibu Shack, about half an hour"  
00:53:05 Vicki's Demise - Monster attack in the studio  
01:00:55 Final Confrontation - "Dad!" at car crash site


This video is available with subtitles in more than 30 languages. Click on ⚙️ and choose your preferred language.
